content.body: Makes sure if we publish a backport, that it’s not published as latest. Given that we don’t seem to ever do that with ecmarkup, it’d be fine to remove the dep and the prepublish scripts, but it also only runs once at publish time ¯\\\_(ツ)\_/¯

content.body: i just reflexively add it to every package i maintain because the lack of it has caused painful problems in the past
I don't mind keeping it, I was just curious
